DOC.brief_summary: By this study the investigators wish to (1) quantify hip strength and functional-performance deficits at discharge after fast-track total hip arthroplasty (THA), and (2) investigate if changes in thigh circumferences, or hip pain are correlated to changes in hip strength and functional-performance after fast-track THA.
DOC.brief_title: Thigh Swelling, Hip-muscle Strength, and Functional Performance Following Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators intend to use the results to optimize the rehabilitation programs for THA patients shortly after surgery
DOC.criteria: Total hip arthroplasty patients inability to speak and understand Danish inability to perform the functional measurements due to other conditions
DOC.keyword: function, hip muscle strength, hip replacement, hip pain,
